|brand = Check Point |model = L-71 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = CPAP-SG730-NGTP-W |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = YHI-NW121 |icid = 9715A-NW121 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 4BQ000S1C3X10 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Annapurna Labs;Alpine AL21200; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F8G08ABBCAH4:C; |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125 IT; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1514; |eth4chip = Marvell;88E1514; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6172; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 6 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1C:7F |oui = 00:1C:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.01;alpine_db_s1-1.65.1-HAL; |stockos = Linux;3.10.20;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, MicroSD Card slot, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, RTC w/ battery |addchip = USB Card Reader IC;Realtek;RTS5176E;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Host Controller;Renasas;D720202;;1;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;2;,,, USB to Full Handshake UART IC;FTDI;FT231X;;1;,,, USB to Full Handshake UART IC;FTDI;FT231X;;1;,,, 512Kb SPI NOR Flash;Macronix;MX25L512EMI-10G;;1;,,, 64Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;On Semiconductor;CAV24C64;;1;,,, Real-Time Clock w/I2C Serial Interface;Renesas;IDT1337;;1;,,, PCI-Express Six Output Clock Generator;Silicon Labs;Si52146;;1;,,, 8-bit Bidirectional Level-Shifting Voltage Translator;TI;TXS0108E;;2;,,, 5V Multichannel RS232 Line Driver/Receiver;TI;TRS213;;1;,,, 20A Synchronous Buck SWIFT Converter;TI;TPS53353;;1;,,, 18V 4A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power;MPQ8632GLE-4;;1;,,, 18V 8A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power;MPQ8632GLE-8;;1;,,, Dual Channel 20MHz CMOS Operational Amplifier w/ Shutdown;TI;OPA2322;;1;,,, 16-Bit I2C & SMBus I/O Expander w/ Interrupt Output & Configuration Registers;TI;TCA9555;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/31/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = NEXCOM NW-121 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 450/450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Toronto S1 L-71WD VER:C", "4BQ000S1C3X10" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" are silkscreened on both sides of the board
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Annapurna Labs]]'' Alpine AL-21200 @1.7GHz (Dual Core ARM Cortex-A15) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 1GB NAND Flash, TF card (max.64GB)/MMC card *WiFi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880-BR4A (802.11abgn+ac) *Network: 8x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 3.0 (Type A) ports
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.checkpoint.com/downloads/products/700-security-gateway-datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Check Point L-71W Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Check Point L-71W Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
